# launch-ui-button

A button element that exists in a product called Launch. This buttons mimics the native button's behavior to submit forms.

<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Properties

| Property      | Attribute      | Description                                                                                                                                                                | Type                                                                                                                                                                          | Default     |
| ------------- | -------------- | -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | ----------- |
| `alignCenter` | `align-center` |                                                                                                                                                                            | `boolean`                                                                                                                                                                     | `undefined` |
| `alignLeft`   | `align-left`   |                                                                                                                                                                            | `boolean`                                                                                                                                                                     | `undefined` |
| `alignRight`  | `align-right`  |                                                                                                                                                                            | `boolean`                                                                                                                                                                     | `undefined` |
| `block`       | `block`        | Displays the button at full-width.                                                                                                                                         | `boolean`                                                                                                                                                                     | `undefined` |
| `bold`        | `bold`         | Renders the button with a bold font weight.                                                                                                                                | `boolean`                                                                                                                                                                     | `undefined` |
| `busy`        | `busy`         | If the button is in a busy active state.                                                                                                                                   | `boolean`                                                                                                                                                                     | `false`     |
| `color`       | `color`        | The color display of the button.                                                                                                                                           | `"black" \| "danger" \| "dark" \| "dark-gray" \| "gray" \| "gray-tint" \| "info" \| "light" \| "light-gray" \| "primary" \| "secondary" \| "success" \| "warning" \| "white"` | `'primary'` |
| `disabled`    | `disabled`     | If the button is disabled and cannot be interacted with.                                                                                                                   | `boolean`                                                                                                                                                                     | `false`     |
| `fill`        | `fill`         | The filled color style for the button. `solid` renders the button with a solid background. `outline` renders the button only as a border. `clear` is a transparent button. | `"clear" \| "outline" \| "solid"`                                                                                                                                             | `'solid'`   |
| `lg`          | `lg`           | Renders the button large.                                                                                                                                                  | `boolean`                                                                                                                                                                     | `undefined` |
| `link`        | `link`         | Renders the button as a text link.                                                                                                                                         | `boolean`                                                                                                                                                                     | `undefined` |
| `shape`       | `shape`        | The rendered shape of the button. `rounded` has a small border radius, `square` has no border radius and `pill` has the maximum border radius.                             | `"circle" \| "pill" \| "rounded" \| "square"`                                                                                                                                 | `'rounded'` |
| `sm`          | `sm`           | Renders the button small.                                                                                                                                                  | `boolean`                                                                                                                                                                     | `undefined` |
| `soft`        | `soft`         | Softened color palette of the button.                                                                                                                                      | `boolean`                                                                                                                                                                     | `undefined` |
| `type`        | `type`         | The type of button to render                                                                                                                                               | `"button" \| "reset" \| "submit"`                                                                                                                                             | `'button'`  |
| `xl`          | `xl`           | Renders the button extra large.                                                                                                                                            | `boolean`                                                                                                                                                                     | `undefined` |


## Events

| Event | Description                                   | Type               |
| ----- | --------------------------------------------- | ------------------ |
| `tap` | Event emitted each time the button is clicked | `CustomEvent<any>` |
